name: collection
description: Displays the info about your collections.

options.name: dudes
options.description: Display your current collection of Dudes.

options.name: reverse
options.description: Whether to reverse the order of the collection.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose collection you want to see. Default to yours.

options.name: items
options.description: Display your current collection of items.

options.name: reverse
options.description: Whether to reverse the order of the collection.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose collection you want to see. Default to yours.
